review: I really like this little device. I love that it is so portable. I can take it with me to a friend's house and stream content available to me through my Amazon Prime account and this has probably sold a few of these simply because people are impressed with what they can do with the Fire TV Stick.  The only reason I did not give this five stars is because, unlike my Kindle, Comcast Xfinity is not a listed cable provider to access Showtime Anytime.  It does appear that HBOGO, just made available through Fire TV Stick, allows users to login through their Comcast Xfinity account, but not Showtime.  I'm not sure how this can be resolved, but I'm sure I'm not the only Comcast subscriber who is perturbed by the fact that I can stream HBOGO through my Kindle and Fire TV stick, and I can stream Showtime though my Kindle--but not on my television?
author: Kathryn E. Claxton

review: The Fire TV Stick works as expected.  I would like to have found more recent movies/TV shows available at no charge from Amazon Prime.  Most of what I did find I can already get from Netflix.
